original: BERGÖ, David Emanuel, Ingenjör, Stockholm, f Filipst 4/3 79 av siiick.mäst N P Petterson o Anna Lundberg, gm Margareta Gustavsson. Filipst l a l 88—92, bergssk Filipst 96—97. Elev o rit v G de Lavals exp.verkstad 95—96, bitr ing Forsviks Br o Nykroppa jvk 98—99, v undersökn f jvgsbyggn Gävle— Sundsv, Ljusdal—Sveg, Orsa—Sveg, Falun-Västerdalarna o Ängelsberg—Vansbro 00—02, bitr ing o stakn.led v undersökn f statsbanor 03—04, f inlandsbanan 05—08, uiidering v stat jvgsbygg 09—11, tf sekt.ing 12—14, sekt.ing 15—35, l:e sekt.ing fr 35. Kontr f ett flert statl o kommun byggn, upprättat förslag t väganläggn Västerb o Norrb 1. Led Sv Tekn-frn. RVO. °BER:LIN, Per David Emanuel, Dessinatör, Norrköping, f Norrk 17/11 90 av A L Berlin o h h, f Öhman, gm Agnes Andersson. Efter avsl skolgång anst v John Lennings vävskola, Norrk, 08—09, elev där 09—10 o 12—13, anst v AB Nyborgs Yllefabriker därst 10—18, v Falu Yllefabrik i Sågmyra 18—19, dessinatör h AB Nyborgs Yllefabrik 19—25, fabr.led o dess h Falu Yllefabrik 25—28, anst v AB Hallbergs Yllefabrik, Norrk, 28—32. Dessinatör v AB Nyborgs Yllefabriker, Norrk, sed. 32. Resor: Tyskl, Frankr o Belg. Medl Sv:s Verkm.frb.
translated:
BERGÖ, David Emanuel, Engineer, Stockholm, b Filipst 4/3 79, s of master N P Petterson and Anna Lundberg, m Margareta Gustavsson. Filipst local authority 1888-1892, Bergsskola Filipst 1896-1897. Student and draftsperson at G de Laval's experimental workshop 1895-1896, assistant engineer at Forsviks Br and Nykroppa Railway 1898-1899, surveyor for road construction Gävle-Sundsv, Ljusdal-Sveg, Orsa-Sveg, Falun-Västerdalarna, and Ängelsberg-Vansbro 1900-1902, assistant engineer and head of surveying for state railways 1903-1904, Inlandsbanan 1905-1908, engineer for state road construction 1909-1911, acting section engineer 1912-1914, section engineer 1915-1935, chief section engineer from 1935. Contracted for several state and municipal buildings, proposed road construction plans for Västerbotten and Norrbotten. Member of the Swedish Technical Association. RVO (Royal Order of Vasa).
BER:LIN, Per David Emanuel, Draftsperson, Norrköping, b Norrk 17/11 90, s of A L Berlin and h h, born Öhman, m Agnes Andersson. After completing school, employed at John Lennings vävskola, Norrk, 1908-1909, student there 1909-1910 and 1912-1913, employed at AB Nyborgs Yllefabriker 1910-1918, at Falu Yllefabrik in Sågmyra 1918-1919, draftsperson at AB Nyborgs Yllefabrik 1919-1925, factory manager and head of Falu Yllefabrik 1925-1928, employed at AB Hallbergs Yllefabrik, Norrk, 1928-1932. Draftsperson at AB Nyborgs Yllefabriker, Norrk, since 1932. Travel: Germany, France, and Belgium. Member of the Swedish Engineering Association.
